title: [1.7.10][ssp/smp][汉化]Custom Sword 自定义宝剑——1679399280种宝剑[更新教程]
author: 九耀龙翔
txt_content:
本帖最后由 九耀龙翔 于 2016-10-17 11:31 编辑 



自定义宝剑这个mod刚刚有人发了，但是机翻+没多少介绍+原址错误顺手举报了然后就过来占坑了{:10_505:}都说了汉化在度盘，官方没人提交汉化，class文件没人汉化（0.13除外）再说没好汉化的买块豆腐撞死图纸使用方法都一样，仔细看说明，再问自杀{:10_494:}
mod介绍
你可以定制45张宝剑的图纸，46样剑柄图纸，13种剑刃，7种宝石，通过染料皮革和改变处理材料来实现制作超过1679399280种不同的定制的剑我勒个擦
原文
Customize your sword using 45 blade schematic, 46 hilts schematic, 13 Materials,13 Blade Edges, 7 gems, dye Leather Swords and change the handle Material to make more than 1,679,399,280 different Custom Swords
下面的内容还需要完善，请随便看看（由于软件问题无法录制解说，请配合图片视频一起观看）




制作

需要使用自定义宝剑工作台↓

图纸：查询合成表，击杀怪物，使用空白图纸左键攻击生物


宝石

宝石效果
火焰：被攻击者燃烧
冰霜：被攻击者会有1秒的缓慢效果（不显示），攻击者会有3秒速度3，急迫3，跳跃提升3
巽（xùn）风：被攻击者会被打飞8格之外
震雷：右键可召唤一道闪电
物理（应该翻译传送的，懒得改了）：右键记录当前坐标，鼠标放上去可见，等最下行变成100%可进行传送
治疗：右键可记录生命值状态，100%后可右键回复记录状态
坤地：拿在手上会有缓慢2，挖掘疲劳2，力量

怪物拿到部分无法合成图纸以及红将军骷髅套的唯一方法就是击杀相应的怪物
日志

Update #13 8/18/15 added 2 new gems and End Stone sword
Update #12 06/28/15
added
Custom Quartz Sword
Custom Netherrack Sword

Quartz Blade Edge
Quartz Handle

Netherrack Blade Edge
Netherrack Handle
Update #11 6/18/15Added
Arifar Hilt Schematic
fixed 
spelling mistake of Shogun
items need to repair a custom swords in Anvil
Update #10 6/02/15Crashing with NEI bug fix
Update #9 5/26/15updated to 1.7.10
gems do not edit the Blade but you can with 13 new Blade Edges
fixed many glichs
Samurai Skeleton and Showgun Skeleton can now spawn with rare swords with added attack
Update #811/06/14you can now change the handle Material and fixed glass swords
and gems now edit the Blade 
added
Flame Core
Skeleton Boss Block
Flame Block
Flame Core Block
Samurai Skeleton 
Showgun Skeleton 
Iron Samurai Kabuto
Iron Samurai Chestplate
Diamond Samurai Kabuto
Diamond Samurai Chestplate
Golden Samurai Kabuto
Golden Samurai Chestplate
Red Showgun Kabuto
Red Showgun Chestplate
26 new Handles
Update #77/01/14added 
Effect on Strike Schematics
Effect to Mobs on Strike Schematics
Effect if Equipped Schematics
Tera Gem / Tera Gem Ore
Lucky Schematic
Custom Glass Sword
Update #65/30/14MANY CODE FIXES
Added 5 new blade schematics and hilts schematics
Added Custom Obsidian Swords
Recoded all of it to help lag and for something fun coming soon
Any old Wolds with Custom Swords will crash with the new ver.
To fix remove all custom swords before using this one
Update #55/04/14re coded all of it to help lag 
added Leather Swords that can be dyed(dyed Schematic for blade/dye for  hilt)
added dyed Schematic
added Custom Sword Work Table
Right Click To add your Custom Sword to table then Right Click with Schematics / gems
Update #4 4/18/14You can now add gems to Black Iron, Emerald, Cold, Carrot and Bone Swords
Added 10 new blade schematics and hilts schematics
added Physic Gem and Block
use Physic Gems to make Portal Swords
added the Durability Display Schematic to display durability...........
Update #34/09/14Added 9 new blade schematics and hilts schematics
You can now re-customize your swords
Added Black Iron Swords, Emerald Swords and Cold Swords
Added Tabs
You can now add gems to Wooden Swords, Stone Swords, Diamond Sword and Golden Sword
Added a total of 22149 new swords  :P
Update #2 4/05/14added Shock Gem Block
added 441 Carrot and 441 Bone Swords
you can now see a sword's effects
Update #14/03/14Fixed the Gaia Blade Schematic
Fixed code to get the Saba Hilt Schematic by punching a wolf with a plan
Added efts to some hilts
And added Shock Gem to be used to make 441 more swords
搬运日志

7.8发布0.13汉化，添加class汉化
6.24发布0.12汉化，添加度盘
6.23发布mod

视频教程（b站）
http://cn-zjsx3-dx.acgvideo.com/115.231.223.196/3/37/3960953-1.flv?expires=1436214000&ssig=X2A1CRNGUIMGfogF56UULQ&o=3663427149&rate=0[bili=6683872]1[/bili]
补充
mod还在WIP，有问题在所难免，有能力的朋友请去和作者交流
我只是搬运工

下载地址                    汉化（感谢Minecraft吧其他吧务+MMLT小组成员提供的汉化）
curse                          度盘  （万分感谢@Keng_Die 提供的0.13版的汉化文件）
官网


你们的支持就是我搬运的最大动力，谢谢一直帮助我的各位{:10_503:}
